com.jswiff.swfrecords
Class LineStyleArray

java.lang.Object
  com.jswiff.swfrecords.LineStyleArray
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class LineStyleArray
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Implements an array of line styles. If used within DefineShape4, the array contains only LineStyle2 instances. Otherwise it contains only LineStyle instances.

WARNING: array index starts with 1, not 0

See Also:
DefineShape4, LineStyle, LineStyle2, Serialized Form

          Creates a new LineStyleArray instance.

Constructor Detail

LineStyleArray

public LineStyleArray()
Creates a new LineStyleArray instance.

Method Detail

addStyle

public void addStyle(java.lang.Object lineStyle)
Adds a line style at the end of the array. Use either LineStyle or LineStyle2 instances.

Parameters:
lineStyle - a line style
See Also:
LineStyle, LineStyle2

getSize

public int getSize()
Returns the size of the line style array.

Returns:
array size

getStyle

public java.lang.Object getStyle(int index)

Returns the line style at the specified position in the array. Can be either a LineStyle or a LineStyle2 instance.

WARNING: indexes start at 1, not at 0!

Parameters:
index - index starting at 1
Returns:
line style located at the specified position
See Also:
LineStyle, LineStyle2

getStyles

public java.util.List getStyles()
Returns all contained line styles as a list.

Returns:
all line styles
